35/* $NetBSD: pcap.h,v 1.4 2014/11/19 19:33:30 christos Exp $ */
36
37
38/*
39 * For backwards compatibility.
40 *
41 * Note to OS vendors: do NOT get rid of this file! Many applications
42 * expect to be able to include <pcap.h>, and at least some of them
43 * go through contortions in their configure scripts to try to detect
44 * OSes that have "helpfully" moved pcap.h to <pcap/pcap.h> without
45 * leaving behind a <pcap.h> file.
46 */
47#include <pcap/pcap.h>
48
